name: Bedge Pictures
longDescription: Bedge Pictures is a wedding photography company that specializes in capturing the most beautiful moments of your special day. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for storytelling, we create stunning visual narratives that you will cherish for a lifetime.

name: BOAS
longDescription: BOAS is a jeans wholesale company that specializes in providing high-quality denim products to retailers and businesses. With a focus on sustainability and ethical production, they focus on donating larger chunk of the proceeds to charity.

name: Employee Voting System
longDescription: The Employee Voting System is a web application designed to facilitate voting among employees in an organization. It allows employees to cast their votes on various topics, ensuring transparency and engagement in decision-making processes.
